title: Blog Workflow Guide
text: This tutorial will help you get started with contributing to Integration Blog series.

title: Blog Workflow Guide
text:
Pre-Requisites

Google Drive
Familiarity with Markdown

title: Blog Workflow Guide
text:
Authoring
Author the blog post in markdown format.

title: Blog Workflow Guide
text:
Uploading

Open the Google Drive folder
In the Blog Writups subfolder, upload the Markdown .md file.

title: Blog Workflow Guide
text:
Publishing

Inform the Integration DIC team about the article, and request inclusion.
The post would be added to the site soon.

title: About
text:
This blog documents our tech stack for conducting the ISI Integration Fest.
It serves as documentation for us, and inspiration for future Fest conductors.
